titles.title: CT Colonography Screening for Colorectal Cancer Act of 2015
A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to cover screening computed tomography colonography as a colorectal cancer screening test under the Medicare program.
CT Colonography Screening for Colorectal Cancer Act of 2015

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary:
CT Colonography Screening for Colorectal Cancer Act of 2015
This bill amends title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to: (1) provide Medicare coverage for screening computed tomography colonography (CTC) as a colorectal cancer screening test, and (2) exclude screening CTC from a special Medicare payment rule applicable to certain imaging services.
